title: Regulation (EEC) No 2268/72 of the Commission of 26 October 1972 amending Commission Regulation Nos 785/67/EEC and 282/67/EEC as regards the price to be paid in respect of oils and fats offered for intervention
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 2268/72 OF THE COMMISSION of 26 October 1972 amending Commission Regulation Nos 785/67/EEC and 282/67/EEC as regards the price to be paid in respect of oils and fats offered for intervention
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following subparagraph shall be added to Article 3 (3) of Regulation No 785/67/EEC and to Article 7 of Regulation No 282/67/EEC:
"This price may be increased by the costs of delivery to the warehouse only if the seller delivers to the warehouse after the offer has been accepted by the intervention agency."

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 October 1972.
For the Commission
The President
S.L. MANSHOLT
